data.title: Slovak companies at the Private Label Expo The portfolio ranges from a detoxifying drink to baby food and croissants ‹ About Us ‹ News ‹ Targi Kielce S.A.
data.text:
Future Private Labels Expo, Poland’s only event entirely devoted to private labels. FPL will bring together producers, distributors and representatives of retail chains from Poland and abroad. Targi Kielce is the meeting point. Among the buyers, there are also entrepreneurs from Poland, Germany, the Czech Republic, Italy and Portugal. Owing to the cooperation with the Polish Investment and Trade Agency, the Polish Chamber of Commerce and the Polish Trade and Distribution Organization, the interest in the expo keeps constantly growing. The list of exhibitors keeps also growing - Polish, German, Albanian, Slovak and even Estonian companies are already preparing their expo stands. As many as 10 companies come from Slovakia and the Slovak zone will be one of the expo sections.

SPACElab is a part of the section - the firm will present Alcohol Killer - a drink with detoxifying, regenerative and vitalizing properties. Owing to its beneficial effects on the body, the is suitable for everyday use. It is not only a hangover cure, but also a drink with antioxidant and anti-radical properties only from natural ingredients.

Kolatch – also comes from Slovakia; the brand was born out of the need to share taste experiences with a wide audience. The company produces traditional confectionery products from the highest quality ingredients using innovative processing technologies.

The exhibitors' milues at the Private Label Expo alco include MPC Cessi a.s. Spišská Nová Ves - a leading pasta producer from Slovakia - the firm focuses on the quality and taste of its products. The offer includes pasta in various shapes - from small, alphabet-spahped noodles, through medium size - dumplings and penne, through long, spaghetti-like. The company also produces various types of pasta - eggless, two-egg noodles, semolina-based without eggs, graham, whole grain.

The company will also showcase its offer on 15 and 16 November. NOVOFRUCT SK – joins the show - the company boasts over 45 years of experience in the production of baby food and products based on fruit puree. The firm offers organic food and meals for babies, fruit purees and desserts for older children, as well as healthy snacks for adults. Owing to multiple production lines, the company’s internal laboratory and a well-experienced research and development department, NOVOFRUCT SK can offer cooperation in the development and production of private labels.

Ant the list inludes Frost a.s. Prešov, the industrial bakery offering baked croissants GRANA NATURA 60g (25% filling). The company offers the product with the flavours of cocoa, strawberry, vanilla, apricot, hazelnut, as well as DUO versions: vanilla-cocoa, vanilla-strawberry, vanilla-blueberry.

Tatrakon s.r.o. Poprad, the largest canned food company in Slovakia will also appear in the Slovak zone. The range includes canned meat, vegan spreads, fish products and ready-made meals. The most frequently sold - Pali delicacy spreads, Bôčiková paste and the famous Morca-della spaghetti sauce. In addition to classic products, the company's assortment includes premium series; last year, the company invested significant amounts in the modernization of production plants, improvement of the technological process and innovations in production.

Further products from Slovakia will be brought by Chocosuc Partner, Tatranská mliekareň a.s. Kežmarok, Intersnack and Milsy. More: Slovak zone at the Private Label Expo in the Kielce exhibition and congress centre Chocolate, chips, cheese…
